lead_paragraph: Igor Andreev upset the defending champion Richard Gasquet, 7-5, 6-2, at the Swiss Open in Gstaad to reach his first semifinal of the season. Andreev will face Andreas Seppi, who defeated Martin Vassalla Arguello, 6-4, 6-0. In the other semifinal, Paul-Henri Mathieu, who defeated Gaël Monfils, 6-1, 4-6, 6-3, will play Radek Stepanek, who beat sixth-seeded Marc Gicquel, 6-3, 6-3.
